sections.content: As a user, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process.
bullets: Users must not post fraudulent job listings or resumes.
Respect the privacy and data of other users.
Comply with all local and international employment laws.
